import React from 'react'; import { Card, ListGroup, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' const custom_style = { width: '45%', borderRadius: "10px", marginLeft: "0" }; function JobCardComponent(data) { return (
{data.JobCompanyName} {data.jobDesignation} {data.jobSalary} {data.jobExpireDate} {data.jobLevel}
) } export default JobCardComponent;
